Title: Are You Better Off?
Plot: Leslie celebrates her first year as a city councilwoman. Retired Special Agent Burt Macklin is recalled to action. April gets some life-changing news. Tom debates a big business opportunity.
GuestStars: Lucy Lawless, Jason Schwartzman, Ben Schwartz, Jenny Slate, Alison Becker, Mara Marini, Darlene Hunt, Todd Sherry, Mary Faber, Jonathan Joss, Marc Evan Jackson
